summary: As the title suggest, this mod allows you to set oil traps on fire with electricity.
descriptionHtml:
Not sure if something like this is already out there, BUT...

Are you like me, have you ever been exploring a dank dimly lit ruin, when
you happen upon a conveniently placed oil slick underneath a bunch of
oblivious Draugr and thought, " I know! I'll just set that oil slick on
fire by shocking it!" only to alert the bloodthirsty abominations to
your presence instead?

WELL NO MORE!

This simple little mod now causes most electrical based attacks to trigger those oil traps,
in fact this mod should trigger anything you could ignite with a fire
attack (Yes, this should work with staffs and runes as well, though that
hasn't been tested). Sure, it's a small detail, sure you could just use
flames, or fire bolt, or some other fire based attack.. but where's the
creative fun in that?

P.S. If you want to upload some better images for this mod, be my guest.. I suck at taking action shots..


You can use this mod in your own mod if you want, yes you can improve upon this mod and release your own version.

Credits go to Bethesda Games for Skyrim, and supporting the modding community by creating the Creation Kit.
author: Mythos214
